Gloria

From: 
Sent: Thursday, May 21, 2020 12:21 PM 
To: Gloria Allred 
Cc: 
Subject: Call today 
cza 
C 
Gloria, 
Would you be available for a quick call this afternoon? We have a couple quick questions for you relating to the Epstein 
case. I'm available to talk any time. 
Thanks, 
EFTA00016449

Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
1  St. Andrew's Plaza 
New York, NY 10007 
This message is CONFIDENTIAL and may contain legally privileged information intended only for the addressee. If you are not the 
addressee you may not use, forward, copy or disclose to anyone any information contained in this message. IF YOU RECEIVED THIS 
COMMUNICATION IN ERROR, PLEASE NOTIFY ALLRED, MAROKO & GOLDBERG IMMEDIATELY BY TELEPHONING THE SENDER NAMED 
ABOVE AT 323-653-6530. Thank you. 
GLORIA ALL 
RED 
RECOGNIZED BY 
Best Lawye
. 
2020 
Martindale-Hubbell'

of Professional Excellence
